728432f-a.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
728432f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, west side, at its juncture with Kreischer
Street, showing the brick works of R. Kreischer & Sons.
October 6, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
728432f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Kreischer Street, Staten Island, NY

728433f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
728433f-b.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road, west side, at its juncture with Kreischer
Street, showing the ruins of the Ereischer Brick Company factory.
The view is eastward toward the road from near the shore of Arthur
Eil1.
May 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperw.
(2)
Another view from a different angle.
May 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A view across the ruins in a westerly direction toward Arthur
Kill from near Arthur Kill Road.
May 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
728433f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Kreischer Street, Staten Island, NY

728434f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
728434f-b.text:
Arthur Kill Road, west side, at its juncture with Kreischer Street,
showing the ruins of the Kreischer Briok Company factory. The view is
wastward toward the road from the shore of Arthur Kill. Discernible in
the right background is one of the Kreischer homes. This is a set of
three views taken the same day.
May 31, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
728434f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Kreischer Street, Staten Island, NY

728431f-c.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
728431f-c.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road (not seen;, west side at its juncture with
Kreischer Street, showing the factory buildings of the Kreischer
Brick Company, as viewed in a southeasterly direction from the shore
of Arthur Kill, near the foot of Androvette Street. Arthur Kill
Road is beyond the factory buildings.
September 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view of the abandoned factory buildings viewed in the
same direction. In the left background are discernible the two
turreted Kreischer houses.
May 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A closer view of the factory ruins. Arthur Kill Road runs
directly in front of the Kreischer houses.
May 3, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
728431f-c.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Kreischer Street, Staten Island, NY

728435f-b.title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Kreischer Street
728435f-b.text:
Arthur Kill Road, east side, between Kreischer
Street and Chirchill Avenue, showing two views of one
of the Kreischer homes. It was the home of one of the
owners of the nearby Kreischer Brick Works.
May 6, 1930
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr
728435f-b.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Kreischer Street, Staten Island, NY

729069f-a.title: Richmond: Kreischer Street - Arthur Kill Road
729069f-a.text:
Kreischer Street, north from Arthur Eill Road.
May 13, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
